forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. High 61F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy with light rain developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
